      • arm

        public void arm()
        Description copied from interface: Trigger

      • disarm

        public void disarm()
        Description copied from interface: Trigger
        Disarm a trigger. After trigger has been disarmed a TriggerListener will not receive events.
        Specified by:
        disarm in interface Trigger<S,E>
